name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 11, when the second trial of Xu Shuangjun's gang-related case opened, the judge attempted to conduct the trial without the defense lawyers. Lawyers Yang Xiao and Wang Xingwei were not allowed to enter the court. They could only enter the court during the recess and asked the judge to immediately stop this illegal trial. The judge decided to adjourn the court immediately after seeing the two. The bailiffs forced to turn off all power supplies, calling it a power outage maintenance. The lawyers waiting to argue with the judge used their mobile phones to illuminate the court in the Hebi Intermediate Court.
On the morning of November 14, the court resumed, and the two were again turned away. When filming and describing the process of being deprived of the right to defend, lawyer Wang Xingwei was controlled by the bailiffs and was also pretended to fall and hit by the bailiffs. He was taken to the police station and was released in the evening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xinhua News Agency investigates journalists being beaten. On November 14, Xinhua News Agency newspaper Economic Information Daily reporters Wang Wenzhi and Cheng Zilong were beaten and their cell phones were snatched while interviewing at the construction site of China Railway Seventh Bureau of Hefei-Xinyi High-speed Railway in Anhui. The on-site video shows that a person in charge at the scene said to the camera that he had seized the reporter's cell phone, and the beating of the reporter might also be done by his subordinates. When faced with the reporter's question "Can we leave?" the person in charge said, "I have arrested the person (reporter), I have arrested the scene, can I let you go?"
It is understood that on November 12, the Economic Information Daily published an investigative report "Elastic cushion layer "opens as soon as it is cut", Hefei-Xinyi Railway construction materials "substituting inferior materials for good materials" pose safety hazards", revealing that many construction units of the Hefei-Xinyi Railway (Hefei to Xinyi) illegally replaced the "EPDM elastic cushion layer" with "recycled rubber imitations" that did not meet the railway industry standards in order to save costs...
fullContent:
新华社调查记者被打。11月14日，新华社报刊《经济参考报》的记者王文志、程子龙在安徽合新高铁中铁七局施工现场采访时被打，手机被抢夺。现场视频显示，一位现场的负责人对着镜头称，记者手机是他扣的，殴打记者可能也是他的下属干的。而面对记者质问“我们可以走了吗？”该负责人则称，“我逮到人（记者）了，我逮到现场了，我能让你走吗？”
据了解，11月12日，《经济参考报》刊发调查报道《弹性垫层“一割就开”，合新铁路建设材料“以次充好”存安全隐患》一文，揭露了合新铁路（合肥至新沂）多家施工单位为节省成本，以次充好，违规将“三元乙丙橡胶弹性垫层”偷换为不符合铁路行业标准的“再生胶仿制品”，这些仿冒品性能远低于设计要求，存在安全隐患。
对此，中铁七局回应称，将配合警方调查。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, a Chinese man graffitied in Chinese on the Serbian monument SAHAT KULA, asking everyone to follow his Douyin account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11 (Release), the owners of Zhonghai Huaishang Jingming Community protested against the developer's false propaganda and deception of consumers. It is reported that when selling the property, the developer deceived consumers, claiming that the newly built primary school next to the property is the East Campus of Huai'an Experimental Primary School. Therefore, parents spent the money of the "first-tier" school to purchase school district housing, but now they are told that their children can only go to the nearby Chengde Road Primary School (an old primary school) to go to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, students from the Central University of Finance and Economics in Beijing launched a call for help on the Internet. The reason was that Zhou Yuchen, a senior girl from the school, accidentally fell to the ground while riding an electric bike when passing the intersection of Yaojiayuan Road and Huawen West Road in Chaoyang District between 8:20 and 8:40 on the morning of November 13, and was later crushed to death by a police car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 31, Xi'an, Shaanxi. Villagers of Guangdamen Village asked the government for transitional fees for demolition. It is understood that the village has been demolished for seven years, and the transitional fees have not been paid for one year and eight months. In addition to Guangdamen Village, there are many demolished villages in Xi'an that are owed transitional fees. It is understood that Lijiajie Village has not paid transitional fees for seven years, Yanxiazhang Village has not paid transitional fees since July last year, and Sanzhao Village has not even signed a transitional fee agreement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 4, Chaozhou, Guangdong. In the Longwan Village Committee of Sucheng Town, Raoping County, the village secretary Wu had a fierce verbal and physical conflict with several villagers over land acquisition compensation. One of the elderly was beaten and hospitalized. It is understood that since 1999, more than 3,000 acres of land in the village have been expropriated for factory and dock construction. Previously, the village promised to pay them 200 yuan per person per year in land acquisition compensation, but so far, each of the more than 8,000 villagers in the village has only received 1,200 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 9, Yongzhou, Hunan. The owners of Chuangfacheng protested against the property management and sued the owners. It is reported that the property management service of the community is extremely chaotic, the access control and surveillance are just for show, the trees and flowers are not watered, and the water, electricity and gas are often out of order. The owners refused to pay the property management fees due to poor property management, so the property management took the owners to court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, in Loudi, Hunan, property owners of the Jinyuxingcheng community in Yuxugong community took to the streets to demand their property certificates.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 11, Yiwu, Zhejiang. Construction workers in Bajiaokan Village, Futian Subdistrict, hold banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 14, Xianyang, Shaanxi. Qian County Public Security Bureau issued the "Notice on Collection of Clues on Internal Corruption Crimes in Small, Medium and Micro Private Enterprises"
 A netizen replied, "Without the ability to fish in the ocean, are you starting to eat grass on the edge of your nest?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, in Yueyang County, Hunan, a notice from the village committee of Bajiao Village, Maotian Town, was circulated online: For those who have not paid for medical insurance, the village committee will not stamp their medical insurance and handle all related procedures, and will not consider year-end hardship care. If a party member does not pay for medical insurance, he or she will be treated as a party member who has quit the party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 14, Serbia. It was revealed online that someone left a striking graffiti signature in Chinese on an ancient clock tower in the country's capital: "Follow an unknown person on Douyin"
Afterwards, someone found the person who carved the words through the Douyin account on the wall. The other party said, "Next time I go to the top of the pyramid, do you think this is okay?"
Netizens responded: This is a foreigner pretending to be a Chinese to smear, and Chinese people would never do such a thing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a device called "Pangu Stone Evidence Machine" appeared at the Zhuhai Air Show. The photographer said that when the mobile phone is connected to the device with a data cable, all the data in the mobile phone will be displayed, whether it is Android Hongmeng or iOS18, it can be cracked in the locked screen state.
Afterwards, a big V blogger consulted the company CEO, who said: "Nonsense, self-media" Such a device does exist, but iOS cannot be cracked without an unlock password.
